name: Boa Hancock
type: The Seven Warlords of the Sea/Kuja Pirates
effect: [On Play] If your Leader has the {The Seven Warlords of the Sea} type, add up to 1 card from the top of your deck to the top of your Life cards. Then, add up to 1 card from the top of your opponent's Life cards to the owner's hand.
trigger: [Trigger] Play up to 1 Character card with 6000 power or less and a [Trigger] from your hand.
